Completeness.description: Assess how successful the task completion is, including solving all sub-tasks, having the correct response format, and completing the task within required steps.

Correctness.description: Evaluate the correctness of each action and thoughts generated by the participant, ensuring they are in line with the rules and they are legal actions.

Efficiency.description: Evaluate the efficiency of the solution, ensuring minimal necessary steps are taken to complete the task.

Quality_of_thoughts.description: Assess the quality of thoughts provided by the participant, including relevance, clarity, and how they contribute to task completion.

Adaptability.description: Evaluate the adaptability of the participant in response to changes in the environment.

Task_specific_rules.description: Assess the participant's adherence to task-specific rules, such as the timing and format of the TERMINATE command.
